archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.7b: b) electronic communications (e.g. using digital signatures, clearly identifying the classification in the subject headers of emails and selecting the appropriate label from a menu)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
